title: 103_hr3390
content: Conflict Resolution and Mediation Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Education to make conflict resolution and mediation program grants to assist local elementary schools most directly affected by conflict and violence. Directs the Secretary to develop a written model for conflict resolution and mediation. Authorizes appropriations. Sets requirements for fund use, applicant eligibility and planning, fund allocation and limitation, awards, and reports.
